column1: '''Aia Mar√≠a''' ("Ave Maria" in [[Quenya]]) is [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s Quenya translation of the [[wikipedia:Ave Maria
column2: Ave Maria]]. Different versions of the prayer were published in [[Vinyar Tengwar 43
column3: ''Vinyar Tengwar'', no. 43]], edited by [[Patrick H. Wynne]], [[Arden R. Smith]], and [[Carl F. Hostetter]].
